snippet: Roy H. Beck is the leader of NumbersUSA, a small but powerful group that has helped scuttle every effort at an immigration overhaul for nearly two decades.
abstract: Profile of Roy H Beck, former environmental journalist who heads NumbersUSA, lobbying group that has helped stop every effort at immigration overhaul for nearly 20 years; Beck says organization's immediate goal, on an annual budget of only about $10 million, is to block funding for President Obama's executive actions protecting up to five million illegal immigrants from deportation.
lead_paragraph: Roy H. Beck is the leader of NumbersUSA, a small but powerful group that has helped scuttle every effort at an immigration overhaul for nearly two decades.

headline.seo: Roy H. Beck Quietly Leads a Grass-Roots Army
headline.main: Genial Force Behind Bitter Opposition to Immigration Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Genial Force Behind Bitter Opposition to Overhaul
